casebody.data:
BANK OF AMERICA, NA, Plaintiff-Respondent,
v.
Sambul RIZVI and Javaid Rizvi, her husband, Defendants-Petitioners,
and
Marwa Tork; Mr. Tork, husband of Marwa Tork; Midland Funding, LLC; and New Century Financial Services, Defendants. C-40 September Term 2018
081085 Supreme Court of New Jersey. September 12, 2018

ORDER

A petition for certification of the judgment in A-003607-16 having been submitted to this Court, and the Court having considered the same;

It is ORDERED that the petition for certification is denied, with costs.
